displayName.japanese: シグムンドも誇りに思うだろう

description.english: Adam woke up from his dream.

description.english: Richard convinced John to come home.
description.german: Richard hat John überzeugt, nach Hause zu kommen.
description.french: Richard a convaincu John de rentrer à la maison.

description.schinese: 理查德说服约翰回家。
description.tchinese: 理查說服約翰回家。

description.english: John reached the big hall inside the Dome.
description.german: John hat die große Halle im Dome erreicht.

description.english: Congratulations. You finished the game.

description.tchinese: 恭喜。您已完成遊戲。

description.italian: Congratulazioni. Hai completato il gioco.
description.brazilian: Parabéns. Você terminou o jogo.

description.italian: Adam ha preparato il piatto preferito di John.
description.turkish: Adam John'a en sevdiği yemeği verdi.
description.brazilian: Adam serviu a comida favorita de John.

displayName.spanish: En la variedad está el gusto

description.english: Adam refused to serve John his favorite meal.
description.german: Adam hat John nicht sein Lieblingsessen serviert.

description.italian: Adam si è rifiutato di preparare il piatto preferito di John.
description.turkish: Adam John'a en sevdiği yemeği vermedi.
description.brazilian: Adam recusou servir a comida favorita de John.

description.english: Adam managed to make John tired.
description.german: John ist eingeschlafen.
description.french: Adam a réussi à faire dormir John.
description.spanish: Adam ha conseguido dormir a John.
description.schinese: 亚当成功让约翰感到累了。
description.tchinese: 亞當想辦法讓約翰感到疲倦。

description.portuguese: Adam conseguiu deixar John cansado.
description.italian: Adam è riuscito a far venire sonno a John.
description.brazilian: Adam conseguiu deixar John cansado.

displayName.french: Je ne connais pas de berceuse

description.english: Adam didn't manage to make John tired.
description.german: John ist nicht eingeschlafen.
description.french: Adam n’a pas réussi à faire dormir John.
description.spanish: Adam no ha conseguido dormir a John.
description.schinese: 亚当没能让约翰感到累了。

description.portuguese: Adam não conseguiu deixar John cansado.
description.italian: Adam non è riuscito a far venire sonno a John.
description.brazilian: Adam não conseguiu deixar John cansado.

description.english: Adam did everything John likes.
description.german: Adam hat alles so gemacht, wie es John gefällt.
description.french: Adam a fait tout ce qu’aime John.
description.spanish: Adam ha hecho todo lo que John quería.
description.schinese: 亚当做了所有约翰喜欢的事。
description.tchinese: 亞當做了每一件約翰喜歡的事。
description.russian: Адам сделал все, что нравится Джону.
description.japanese: アダムは、ジョンの好きなこと全部をやった。
description.portuguese: Adam fez tudo de que John gosta.
description.italian: Adam ha fatto tutto quello che voleva John.
description.turkish: Adam John'un sevdiği her şeyi yaptı.
description.brazilian: Adam fez tudo de que John gosta.

description.english: Adam did nothing John likes.
description.german: Adam hat nichts so gemacht, wie es John gefällt.
description.french: Adam n’a rien fait de ce qu’aime John

description.schinese: 亚当没做一件约翰喜欢的事。
description.tchinese: 亞當不做任何約翰喜歡的事。
description.russian: Адам не сделал ничего, что нравится Джону.

description.portuguese: Adam fez nada de que John gosta.
description.italian: Adam non ha fatto nulla di quello che voleva John.
description.turkish: Adam John'un sevdiği hiçbir şeyi yapmadı.
description.brazilian: Adam fez nada de que John gosta.

description.english: Adam allowed Sally to call him Adam.

description.tchinese: 亞當允許莎莉叫他亞當。

description.italian: Adam ha permesso a Sally di chiamarlo Adam.
description.turkish: Adam Sally'nin ona Adam demesine izin verdi.
description.brazilian: Adam permitiu que Sally o chame de Adam.

description.italian: Richard ha riavuto la sua famiglia. Più o meno.
description.brazilian: Richard recuperou sua família. Mais ou menos.

displayName.japanese: ここにいろ…ただここにいろ…

description.english: Adam spent more than 25 Minutes in Liquid Sky.
description.german: Adam hat mehr als 25 Minuten im Liquid Sky verbracht.
description.french: Adam a passé plus de 25 minutes au Liquid Sky.
description.italian: Adam ha passato più di 25 minuti al Liquid Sky.
description.spanish: Adam ha pasado más de 25 minutos en Liquid Sky.
description.schinese: 亚当在流音天空停留超过25分钟。
description.tchinese: 亞當待在暢流天空超過 25 分鐘。
description.russian: Адам провел более 25 минут в «Жидком небе».
description.japanese: アダムはリキッドスカイで25分以上過ごした。
description.portuguese: Adam gastou mais de 25 minutos no Céu Líquido.
description.turkish: Adam Saydam Gökyüzü'nde 25 dakikadan fazla geçirdi.
description.brazilian: Adam gastou mais de 25 minutos no Céu Líquido.

description.english: You mixed a potion on the first try.
description.german: Beim ersten Versuch ein Mittel zusammen gemischt.
description.french: Vous avez concocté une potion du premier coup.
description.spanish: Has mezclado la poción a la primera.
description.schinese: 你第一次尝试就做出药剂。
description.tchinese: 你混合藥水一次就成功。
description.russian: Вы смешали зелье с первой попытки.
description.japanese: 最初の挑戦で、薬を調合した。
description.portuguese: Você misturou uma poção na primeira tentativa.
description.italian: Hai preparato una pozione al primo tentativo.
description.brazilian: Você misturou uma poção na primeira tentativa.
